definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: The film is an American version of a two thousand eight French thriller called "Pour Elle."
sentences.chinese: 这部电影是一个二千八法语称为“倒艾莉。”

sentences.english: If you live near Quebec, you will probably be able to pick up some French stations.
sentences.chinese: 如果你住在魁北克附近，你或许会找到一些法语电台。

sentences.english: Speaking French and playing the piano are social graces.
sentences.chinese: 讲法语和弹钢琴是社交界的两大风雅。

sentences.english: There's an acute accent on thee in 'blé' which is the French word for corn.
sentences.chinese: 在法语中是玉米的意思，它上面有个强调符号。

sentences.english: Should more scientific writing and studies be in the French language?
sentences.chinese: 是否应当更多地以法语进行科学著述和研究呢？

sentences.english: My French has got rather rusty.
French and Portuguese are Romance languages.
sentences.chinese: 法语和葡萄牙语都是罗曼语。

sentences.english: In French, words are either masculine or feminine, singular or plural.
sentences.chinese: 在法语中，词语有阴阳性和单复数的变化。

sentences.english: After Greek, we would learn to read French.
sentences.chinese: 学完希腊语后，我们将学习法语。

sentences.english: A song sung in the evening.
In addition to Korean, Mr. Ban speaks English and French.
sentences.chinese: 除韩国语外，潘基文先生还讲英语和法语。

sentences.english: how many beasts we heard talking good French like that?
sentences.chinese: 我们听过多少“野兽“像那样讲流利的法语？

sentences.english: He wants to furbish up his French.
sentences.chinese: 他要温习一下他的法语。

sentences.english: She aced out on that test in French.
sentences.chinese: 那次法语测验她得了满分。

sentences.english: I might have taken French last semester if I'd known it was offered.
sentences.chinese: 如果知道了上个学期开设了法语课的话我会选学的。

definition: Korean language (esp. in context of South Korea)
